briefTitle: A Study of MK0663/Etoricoxib for Post-Abdominal Hysterectomy Surgery Pain (0663-097)(COMPLETED)
officialTitle: A Double-Blind, Placebo-Controlled, Multicenter Trial to Study the Efficacy and Tolerability of MK0663/Etoricoxib in the Treatment of Pain After Abdominal Hysterectomy
conditions: Acute Pain Following a Total Abdominal Hysterectomy
summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the efficacy and safety of etoricoxib compared to placebo in the treatment of postoperative pain associated with total abdominal hysterectomy.

primaryOutcome.measure: Average Pain Intensity at Rest Over Days 1 to 3
